channel.title: How to make a Soundcloud link appear in thread title
channel.description:
You may have noticed that some threads have a Soundcloud link in the title, like this: -
![51 PM|690x60](upload://u5kEdypcDax5xKov40fzFJUEYpd.jpg)
If you click the button to create a new topic and then paste the Soundcloud URL into the thread title, it adds that link to the thread name.
For the example above, I pasted the link in the title field, wrote some text below and then changed the thread title to "Drone - MisterMaster", but when I created the thread, it remembered the URL.
Although interestingly, I'm unsure how to remove or edit that link once it's been posted.

item.title: How to make a Soundcloud link appear in thread title
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
You may have noticed that some threads have a Soundcloud link in the title, like this: -

If you click the button to create a new topic and then paste the Soundcloud URL into the thread title, it adds that link to the thread name.

For the example above, I pasted the link in the title field, wrote some text below and then changed the thread title to “Drone - MisterMaster”, but when I created the thread, it remembered the URL.

Although interestingly, I’m unsure how to remove or edit that link once it’s been posted.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a Soundcloud link appear in thread title
